Title: Arjan
Writer: Mandeep Chahal (screen play and dialogue), Mandeep Chahal (story), Nihal Purba (screen play and dialogue)
Actors: Hobby Dhaliwal, Karanveer Kaur, Shavendra Mahal, Roshan Prince
Plot: A young woman who promises her uncle she will marry a Punjabi man has other plans up her sleeve.
